jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.detail: Responsible for server-side web application logic and integration of the work front-end developers do.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.detail: Responsible for implementing visual elements that users see and interact with in a web application.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.detail: Works on both the front-end and back-end of applications, handling projects that involve databases, building user-facing websites, or even working with clients during the planning phase of projects.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.detail: Works with software developers, system operators, and other production IT staff to oversee code releases.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.detail: Uses statistical methods to analyze data and generate useful business reports.

jobs.title: Cyber Security Analyst
jobs.detail: Protects an organization’s computer systems and networks from various cyber threats.

jobs.title: Network Engineer
jobs.detail: Responsible for designing, implementing, monitoring, and managing the local and wide area networks of an organization.

jobs.title: Systems Administrator
jobs.detail: Manages and maintains an organization's IT infrastructure.

jobs.title: Database Administrator
jobs.detail: Responsible for the performance, integrity, and security of a database.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.detail: Designs and develops machine learning and deep learning systems.

jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
jobs.detail: Designs and manages cloud environments and services.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.detail: Creates software for mobile devices.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.detail: Oversees the development and delivery of products.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.detail: Designs user interfaces and user experiences for digital products.

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
jobs.detail: Ensures that software products meet quality standards.

jobs.title: IT Support Specialist
jobs.detail: Provides technical support to users.

jobs.title: Business Analyst
jobs.detail: Analyzes business needs and develops solutions.

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.detail: Creates manuals, guides, and other documentation for technical products.

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.detail: Designs and implements security systems to protect an organization’s IT infrastructure.

jobs.title: Penetration Tester
jobs.detail: Tests computer systems, networks, and web applications to find security vulnerabilities.

jobs.title: Software Architect
jobs.detail: Makes high-level design choices and dictates technical standards, including software coding standards, tools, and platforms.

jobs.title: Game Developer
jobs.detail: Designs and creates video games for computers, consoles, and mobile devices.

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs.detail: Develops and optimizes blockchain protocols, crafts the architecture of blockchain systems, and develops smart contracts and web apps using blockchain technology.

jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.detail: Works to ensure that an organization's website and applications are reliable and perform well.

jobs.title: Embedded Systems Engineer
jobs.detail: Designs and develops embedded systems, which are specialized computing systems that perform dedicated functions.

jobs.title: IT Project Manager
jobs.detail: Plans, executes, and closes projects related to IT.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.detail: Interprets data and turns it into information which can offer ways to improve a business.

jobs.title: Cyber Security Consultant
jobs.detail: Provides expert advice and solutions to help organizations protect their IT systems and data from cyber threats.

jobs.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
jobs.detail: Develops AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems.

jobs.title: Robotics Engineer
jobs.detail: Designs, builds, and maintains robots.

jobs.title: Technical Support Engineer
jobs.detail: Provides technical support and troubleshooting for IT systems and software.

jobs.title: IT Auditor
jobs.detail: Evaluates the information systems and IT infrastructure of an organization to ensure compliance with standards and regulations.

jobs.title: Network Security Engineer
jobs.detail: Designs and implements secure network solutions to protect against cyber threats.

jobs.title: Software Tester
jobs.detail: Tests software to identify bugs and issues before the product is released.

jobs.title: Chief Information Officer (CIO)
jobs.detail: Oversees the IT strategy and implementation for an organization.
